Posts.EditableText: I've seen other forums powered by BBCode (or weblinks ending in .php) where the format for posting appears exactly as we see here except underneath the message, there is a button to do a spellcheck on what's been written. It seems that more and more members are needing this option. I'm posting this as a new topic in general as to not point fingers and intentionally embarrass the ones who seemingly cannot spell very well. Is the spell check option available in this forum?

Posts.EditableText:
I've been offered once or twice... I even think I got an email from google too - to my hotmail account no less!

But I didn't go for it - no point as I have a public and private address and no need for such a high amount of email storage space...

And I don't really have an opinion on where hotmail is on the rung. I mean it shows me the message headers, it disables most content for me and filters out 99% of the spam that goes into it. Seeing as how I only recieve [b:19xgij8t]stuff[/b:19xgij8t] through it, it seems fine to me. (stuff refers to newsletters/spam).
Posts.HTML:
